forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will give way to partly cloudy conditions this afternoon. High 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will give way to some clearing this afternoon. High 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will become heavy at times late. Low -4C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will become heavy at times late. Low 27F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. A foot or more of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow...heavy at times. High 3C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 30cm or more of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to all snow. Snow may be heavy at times in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow along with gusty winds at times, especially in the evening. Thunder possible. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow. Winds will be gusty at times in the evening. Thunder possible. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. High 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 15F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Morning high of 2C with temps falling to -8 to -6. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. Morning high of 37F with temps falling to near 20. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 14F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 19F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 21F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 28F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
